entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add a JSON schema exporting component for STJ contracts #102788
    9.0.0
  • Environment.FailFast in .NET 8 Container Yields Segmentation Fault (Exit Code 139) #102785
  • JIT generates suboptimal assembly code when using pattern matching #102781
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder writes incorrect type names to generated assembly for nested types #102777
  • SPMI Replay failing sporadically #102773
  • HttpIOException when establishing connection, unobserved task exception #102772
  • False positive test Interop/Interop/Interop.dll #102768
  • Patch skipping crashing in functions marked with [UnmanagedCallersOnly] #102767
  • Suggestion: make Process.StartInfo a best-effort API #102766
  • Filename/path encoding incorrectly causes file-not-found, when EnumerateFiles provided said file #102764
  • Widespread perf regressions due to RPO layout #102763
    9.0.0
  • [WASM][MT] fail: System.TypeLoadException: Could not resolve type with token #102762
    9.0.0
  • Issue with LDAP connection on RHEL\Rocky #102757
  • Android App crashes with abort_application() #102752
  • [browser][MT] JSMarshalerArgument.ToJSContext crashes with "ContextHandle not set" #102749
  • [browser] Migrate `wasmconsole` template to WebAssembly SDK #102743
    9.0.0
  • Corner case virtual method resolution bugs #102741
    Future

Closed

  • Passing a Stream Utf8JsonWriter to a JsonSerializer.Serialize method results in Pending bytes being misreported #66102
    9.0.0
  • EventPipe hangs with a shared NativeAOT library #89346
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add option to deseralize to private setters without explicitly annotation with `JsonIncludeAttribute` #102787
  • XmlSerializer.Deserialize fails when element contains XML content #102737
  • Problem when including the `corprof.h` file to use the Profiling API #102701
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Trimmer and NativeAOT do not consider DoesNotReturnAttribute for diagnostics #102677
  • AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture no longer returns the correct result #77697
    7.0.x
  • Unexpected behavior when using ref structs in foreach loop #102665
  • Using PersistedAssemblyBuilder, TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride() throws NotSupportedException #102694
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.DynamicChainTests.BasicConstraints_ExceedMaximumPathLength #102358
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.ChainErrorsAtMultipleLayers #102359
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.InvalidSelfSignedSignature #102360
  • JIT: Some SIMD intrinsics operations don't reliably fold memory addressing logic #33002
    Future
  • LoggerMessage source generator does not work with logger from primary constructor. #91121
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: in place functions for TensorPrimitives #102761
  • `System.Text.Json` can't handle collection expressions in source gen mode #102746
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for build/bundler changes #70762
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketAsyncEventArgsTest.Connect_WithData_OK #102650
  • `optRemoveRedundantZeroInits` doesn't know about some safe points #102577
    9.0.0
  • Activator.CreateInstance<T> does not bring compile error or throw exception for required property #102734

PullRequests

Created

  • [Preview 5] Avoid new constraint with structs in ILLink analyzer #102790
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Connect align instruction after a label gets possibly added #102789
    NO-REVIEW
  • Fix incorrect metadata token written for array, pointer populated from TypeBuilder #102786
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Avoid new constraint with structs in ILLink analyzer #102784
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • LSRA: Make genRegMask() return `regMaskTP` #102783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test for dataflow in local method group passed as argument to delegate #102782
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Don't trim members called by TypeDescriptor's use of reflection #102780
    area-System.Data
  • Backport #102613 to preview 5 #102778
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • don't return ConnectOperation as we are not pooling it #102776
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Use alz3 images for all current Mariner images #102775
    area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid reporting new callstack chain on exceptions #102774
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use floating tags for 1ES pt #102771
    needs-area-label
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2461953 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add support for Sve.StoreNonTemporal() #102769
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • NativeAOT/linux/arm: Fix native linux/arm failure #102760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve early returns for HashSet SubSet and SetEquals methods #102758
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Align reflection name formatting with CoreCLR-JIT #102756
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tweaks for renting buffer from the array pool in INumberBase #102755
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize allocations in HttpUtility.UrlDecodeToBytes for smaller inputs. #102753
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Don't query for negotiated ALPN protocol after renegotiation on Windows #102751
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add some more `#ifdef BACKGROUND_GC` to enable compilation for Wasm #102750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Use stackalloc char&byte arrays for decoding Url values in HttpUtiliy.ParseQueryString #102745
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • fix crossgen2determinism test #102742
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Periodically flush when using PipeWriter in Json #102541
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Bump prerelease version to 6 #102589
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102639
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ILLink: Add test for event warning origin issue #102405
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [LoongArch64] Synchronize with PR#102592. #102711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview5] Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102674
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix inspect gchandle #102637
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix pri-1 test build breaks #102740
    needs-area-label
  • fix connect test extension #102668
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • [RISC-V] Improve code generating resolve stub assembly #102318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Conservative fix for struct stores in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #102580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Improve Ascii.FromUtf16 and FromHexString #102735
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • Make CreateAppHost test use TestArtifact instead of its own class #102625
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add ActivitySource Tags #102678
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fill in FeatureCheckDataflow.cs assertions with issue links #102679
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport 1ES templates #102681
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Socket.DontFragment can't be set on IPv6 DualMode sockets #102700
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host
  • Fix DispatchProxy throwing TypeLoadException for static virtual members #102718
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Make constructors private for parts of the ComInterfaceGenerator that should only be created from their static methods #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use new package for tracking SDK version number #102713
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Disable downlevel tests for non-main branches in non-simple WasmBuildTests #102722
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize "(vec & cns) == zero" on arm64 #102705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` structs #102717
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix some comment typos #101232
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update the JIT to support rewriting more complex intrinsics as user calls #102702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • JSMarshalAs JSType Adjust comments and type parameters #101981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Package validation fail #41199

Closed

  • Project restore fails for .NET MAUI Hybrid App on .NET 8 - Workload dependency issue #40978
  • global.json file SDK version is "9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5" but I dont see that SDK version anywhere #41176
  • [net7] Creating a cross-targeted `net7.0-ios` + `net6.0-ios` packages forces consumers to build with net7 workloads #30103

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Update to may implicit version #41164
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix license scan test pipeline #41214

  • Fix license scan test pipeline #41200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41131

  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #41190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

Updated

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Confusing error message when using `in this` with an enum #73746
  • Invalid implicit cast of async lambda expression to Action #73745
  • Compiler chooses params span overload in expression trees leading to errors #73743
  • Unexpected behavior when using ref structs in foreach loop #73741
  • "Use collection expression" code fix drops comments in certain cases #73740
    Backlog
  • ArraySegment<T> s = []; leads to wrong initialization #73738
  • Better optimizations around combining string concatenation and string interpolation #73736
  • Having two embedded resources dependent on the same file causes CS1508 error #73735

Closed

  • IDE0055 false positive with `[..XXX]` pattern #73742

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a more sensible MEF export for brace completion #73756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pause a short while before computing if fixes or refactorings are available at a particular line #73755
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update config after snap 17.11 Preview 2 #73754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove explicit GC calls in the asset cache #73752
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove poison attributes #73751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix issue where we were querying a linq expression over and over #73750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update Debugger.Contracts to 17.11.0-beta.24274.2 #73748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move MutableNamingStyle to VS layer #73744
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change the DocumentationCommentId to use a PooledStringBuilder #73737
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Use a new consistent pattern for working with 'args' objects in callbacks #73749
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.11 Preview 2 #73753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Align sort implementation with reference from dotnet/runtime #73739
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P2
  • Optimization of (de)serialization of ProjectId.DebugNames #73734
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P2
  • Lower allocations in tagging #73729
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.11 P2
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73683
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, 17.11 P2

Updated

  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement alg that determines which projects need to be restarted/rebuilt due to rude edits #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option1) #73725
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache options we compute during refactoring operations (option2) #73726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix race causing workspace diagnostics to be stale #73653
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine OutOfProcessToInProcessHostingModelSwitchWorks #55937
  • Quarantine ReaderThrowsResetExceptionOnInvalidBody #55936
  • Quarantine DynamicRoutesAreMatchedInDefinitionOrderOverPrecedence #55934
  • Quarantine MatchesConventionalRoutesInTheirBranches #55933
  • Quarantine TestingInfrastructure_RedirectHandlerFollowsStatusCode303 #55932
  • Quarantine MatchesControllerGroup #55931
  • Quarantine CacheTagHelper_AllowsVaryingByUICulture #55930
  • Quarantine CanApplyEndpointFilterToController #55929
  • Quarantine Renders_RoutingComponent #55928
  • Quarantine OrderedGroupMetadataForControllers #55927
  • Quarantine DisablingClientValidation_DisablesItForPagesAndViews #55926
  • Server Interactive Blazor Pages do not respect Sign-out with multiple browser tabs #55925
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55922
  • Perf regression: json #55921
  • CultureInfo difference in ValueProviderFactory implementations #55920
  • Retry ConnectionCanSendAndReceiveDifferentMessageSizesWebSocketsTransport #55918
  • Update the baseline for Blazor WASM perf dashboard to .NET 8 #55917
    9.0-preview7
  • `dotnet user-secrets` environment detection faulty #55912

Closed

  • Style sheet not working after upgrade of ASP.NET Core MVC 7.0 application to 8.0 #55383
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextWithFilter #55913
  • [Blazor] Improve Blazor Server reconnect UI #55721
    9.0-preview5
  • IssuerAddress not being set in OpenidConnectHandler.HandleChallengeAsyncInternal #55774
  • Cascading App.razor component for all pages and components in Blazor #55909
  • QuickGrid collection from OnParametersSet not working with static SSR #55915
  • Perf regression: mvc #55908

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine the flakiest IIS tests #55938
    area-networking
  • Quarantine flaky MVC functional tests #55935
    area-mvc
  • Update WithOpenApi docs and scrub description IDs #55924
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Retry ConnectionCanSendAndReceiveDifferentMessageSizesWebSocketsTransport #55923
    area-infrastructure
  • Update AuthenticationSchemeProvider.cs public constructor summary punctuation #55919
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Date only and time only is not supported in blazor change detection for parameters #55914
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary pragmas #55810
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24277.1 #55900
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fix AntiforgeryMiddlewareTest for non-US date formats #55779
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Allowing for the content type/encoding to be specified for the main Result types #55888
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Finally I was able to create the IPA file with this command and upload the file with altool without any errors. #22694
  • Error building the tutorial app #22692
  • GetPlacemarksAsync always returns null when running on Windows #22690
  • Geolocation.StartListeningForegroundAsync stopps calling event after 2 positions on Android #22683
  • [iOS] Crash because of FontIconSource #22682
  • [iOS] CollectionView flickers when Label in DataTemplate has TextType="Html" #22681
  • Horizontal Scrollview and StackLayout not scrolling with mouse scroll wheel - Windows Platform #22680
  • Webview Navigating Cancel = true request is still send on WinUI #22678
  • [MAUI][VS Code]When you quickly scroll the Vertical CollectionView, the page will get stuck. #22677
  • GestureRecognizers overlaps in a control #22675
  • [Android][CollectionView]Crash when quickly clicking to delete item #22674

Closed

  • TitleView causes memory leaks #21968
    Backlog
  • Layout cycle crash on Windows with Button with image inside FlexLayout #21970
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [Testing] Move repetitive code that was created during Appium bump to extension methods #22063
    .NET 8 SR6

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Any release notes for 8.0.6 ? #33830
  • Unsafe accessors failing for backing fields in 9.0-preview5 #33828
  • 'Contains' on Value Types / Different Behavior of Like and ILike #33827
  • Concurrent insert can cause AsSplitQuery to fail to populate unrelated child collections #33826

Closed

  • Support top level Json Arrays for JsonColumns in EF #33829
  • New Provider - Why is Avg aggregate projection truncating precision? #33807

PullRequests

Merged

  • Skip Sqlite functional tests on MacOs #33809
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.7 to 2.1.8 #33824
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Implement nullability computation for `SqlFunctionExpression` #33814
  • Check arity consistency when constructing `SqlFunctionExpression`s #33815
  • Implement sum and average aggregation for `decimal` in SQLite #33721
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
  • Output test logging for query tests only on error #33819
  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633
  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747
  • Pass sequence annotations (#33780) #33804
    community-contribution
  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33746
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Skip sync tests in Cosmos #33756
